WelcomeMessage: <color=#ff9966>The Endless Dream awakens...</color> <color=#aaaaaa>The abyss of dreams awaits</color>
Zone_LavaLand: <color=#ff6644>The scorching breath of the molten lands engulfs you...</color>
Zone_DarkCave: <color=#8866aa>Uneasy echoes resonate through the dark caverns...</color>
Zone_SnowMountain: <color=#aaddff>The frozen peaks chill you to the bone...</color>
Zone_Ink: <color=#334455>The Ink realm blurs the line between dream and reality...</color>
Zone_Despair: <color=#663366>The realm of Despair weighs upon your soul...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_SpawnWell: <color=#66ffcc>* An ancient well emanates mysterious energy here...</color>

Mod_RoomMod_SpawnAscension: <color=#ffaaff>* A Shrine of Ascension radiates transcendent power...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_SpawnMirrorOfRemorse: <color=#aaaacc>* A Mirror of Remorse reflects your past...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_SpawnMawOfDoom: <color=#ff4466>! The Maw of Doom opens here, hungrily awaiting sacrifice...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_SpawnHatred: <color=#8844aa>! A Remnant of Hatred whispers curses from the shadows...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_SpawnEntanglement: <color=#66aaff>* A Shrine of Entanglement twists the threads of fate...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_SpawnDisintegration: <color=#ff6688>* A Shrine of Disintegration emanates destructive power...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_SpawnParadox: <color=#aa88ff>* A Shrine of Paradox warps reality here...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_SpawnBlessedGuidance: <color=#ffdd88>* A Blessed Shrine of Guidance radiates holy light...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_SpawnAltarOfCleansing: <color=#88ffaa>* An Altar of Cleansing awaits cursed souls...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_FragmentOfRadiance_StartProp: <color=#ffffaa>✦ A stone radiating holy light slumbers here... A Fragment of Radiance?</color>
Mod_RoomMod_RiskOfMeteors: <color=#ff8844>! Falling meteors loom in the sky above...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_InkStrikeWarning: <color=#445566>! Ink artillery strikes from the void...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_AcceleratedTime: <color=#ffff88>> Time flows faster in this place...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_VeilOfDark: <color=#554466>! A veil of darkness shrouds this area...</color>
Mod_RoomMod_GravityTraining: <color=#9988ff>! Gravity weighs heavily in this place...</color>
BossRoomEntry: <color=#ff4444>! A powerful presence awaits ahead...</color> <color=#ffaa44>Prepare for battle!</color>
BossRoomVictory: <color=#66ff66>* The nightmare recedes, but the endless abyss stretches on...</color>
ShortcutDiscovered: <color=#aaccff>The corridors of dreams intertwine... A hidden passage has revealed itself</color>
DeadEndReached: <color=#888888>This path ends here. Turn back and seek another way...</color>
RevisitingRoom: <color=#888888>You return to a dream you've walked before...</color>
Milestone_5: <color=#ffcc00>* Depth 5 - The dreams grow more dangerous...</color>
Milestone_10: <color=#ff9944>* Depth 10 - You've reached the heart of dreams...</color>
Milestone_20: <color=#ff4444>* Depth 20 - You've entered the abyss of dreams...</color>
Milestone_25: <color=#ff2222>* Depth 25 - Few dreamers have ventured this far...</color>

EventRoom: <color=#ddaaff>A strange encounter awaits in the dream...</color>
HunterInfected: <color=#ff4444>! The Hunter's presence spreads to nearby dreams...</color>
HunterEncounter: <color=#ff0000>! The Hunter's presence engulfs this dream! Beware, the hunted ones approach...</color>
PlayerInfected: <color=#ff6600>! The Hunter's essence clings to you! You will spread the infection to the next dreams...</color>
PlayerSpreadInfection: <color=#ff4444>! The Hunter's essence on you has infected this dream...</color>
PlayerInfectionCured: <color=#44ff44>The Hunter's essence has faded from you.</color>
HunterPathWarning: <color=#ff4444>The Hunter's corruption spreads through the dream, new cursed paths have appeared...</color>
Curse_MeteorFury: <color=#ff6600>The Hunter curses you with Meteor Fury! The sky shall rain fire upon you...</color>
Curse_InkStorm: <color=#4444ff>The Hunter curses you with Ink Storm! Dark ink shall fall from above...</color>
Curse_FlameEngulf: <color=#ff4400>The Hunter curses you with Flame Engulf! Fire shall burn beneath your feet...</color>
Curse_ToxicMiasma: <color=#44ff44>The Hunter curses you with Toxic Miasma! Poisonous fog shall shroud your path...</color>
Curse_BlackRain: <color=#445566>The Hunter curses you with Black Rain! Corrosive rain shall fall from above...</color>

WeakenedBossDefeated: <color=#ffcc00>* The weakened boss has been vanquished! The dream's rifts open once more...</color>
BossPrompt_Mon_Forest_BossDemon: <color=#ff6666>! A withered presence trembles in the darkness... The Forest Demon's shadow lingers here</color>
BossPrompt_Mon_Sky_BossNyx: <color=#ff6666>! An ominous glow flickers in the night sky... Nyx's weakened form approaches</color>
BossPrompt_Mon_SnowMountain_BossSkoll: <color=#ff6666>! A chilling howl echoes through the air... Skoll's remnant lurks here</color>
BossPrompt_Boss_Treant: <color=#ff6666>! A withered ancient tree trembles in the darkness... The Treant's shadow lingers here</color>
BossPrompt_Boss_Yeti: <color=#ff6666>! A chilling roar echoes through the air... The Yeti's weakened form approaches</color>
BossPrompt_Boss_Devourer: <color=#ff6666>! Hungry whispers emerge from the void... The Devourer's remnant lurks here</color>
BossPrompt_Boss_Erebos: <color=#ff6666>! Darkness coalesces into a familiar form... A fragment of Erebos awakens</color>
BossPrompt_Default: <color=#ff6666>! You sense a familiar yet weakened presence... {0} lurks here</color>
IntroLore1: In the deepest reaches of the dream, there exists a forgotten realm...
IntroLore2: Here, fragments of all worlds intertwine to form an endless labyrinth. The whispers of forests neighbor the roar of lava, frozen peaks connect to dark caverns.
IntroLore3: Every step leads you deeper into the unknown abyss. The deeper you venture, the stronger the dreams become, but so do the treasures.
IntroFeature1: - Infinitely generated dungeon nodes, endless exploration
IntroFeature2: - Each node from different worlds: Forest, Lava, Snow, Dark Cave...
IntroFeature3: - Depth system: only exploring new nodes increases depth
IntroFeature4: - Monster respawn: revisiting rooms respawns monsters for farming
IntroFeature5: - Shrine persistence: used shrines and wells maintain their state
IntroFeature6: - Boss nodes: continue exploring after defeating bosses
IntroEssenceNerfDesc: Essence gains are reduced for a more challenging experience. This is an optional balance adjustment.
IntroCredits: — Chino, a dreamer who weaves dreams —
IntroPersonalMessage:
To all brave Dreamwalkers:

This endless dream is a gift woven with love. May every traveler who steps into this realm find their own adventure and wonder within these boundless illusions.

May your dream never end.
ResultSummaryVictory: You have conquered the endless dream. The pure white light guides you home.
ResultSummaryGameOver: The dream consumed your consciousness, but your journey shall be remembered...
ResultSummaryConcede: You chose to awaken from the dream, departing with all you've gained...
POT_GREED: <color=#ff6600>* The price of greed... A powerful foe approaches!</color>
PURE_WHITE_RIFT: <color=#ffffff>* A pure white rift has appeared...</color> <color=#aaddff>The origin of dreams beckons</color>
